AA.name: Debit advice
AA.desc: Receiver of the payment message needs to return a debit advice in response to the payment message.

AB.name: Message acknowledgement
AB.desc: Indicates that an acknowledge relating to receipt is required.

AF.name: Debit advice/message acknowledgement
AF.desc: The sender wishes to receive both a Debit Advice and an acknowledgement of receipt for a payment message.

AG.name: Authentication
AG.desc: Authentication, by a party, of a document established for him by another party.

AP.name: Accepted
AP.desc: Indication that the referenced offer or transaction (e.g., cargo booking or quotation request) has been accepted.

CA.name: Conditionally accepted
CA.desc: Indication that the referenced offer or transaction (e.g., cargo booking or quotation request) has been accepted under conditions indicated in this message.

CO.name: Confirmation of measurements
CO.desc: Indication that the message contains the physical measurements on which the charges will be based.

RE.name: Rejected
RE.desc: Indication that the referenced offer or transaction (e.g., cargo booking or quotation request) is not accepted.
